title: How to Make Soft Peanut Butter Cookies

steps.headline: Add the butter, peanut butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg and vanilla to a mixing bowl.
Add the dry ingredients to another mixing bowl.
Add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture.
Roll dough into balls and place on a baking sheet.
steps.description: For ease of clean-up line the baking sheet with parchment paper.

steps.headline: Bake the cookies for 7 to 9 minutes.
Remove the cookies from the oven and let cool a few minutes before placing them on cooling racks.

text: Add the butter, peanut butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg and vanilla to a mixing bowl. Cream the mixture well. Add the dry ingredients to another mixing bowl. Mix to combine. Add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture. Mix well. Chill dough for about 45 minutes.  Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Roll dough into balls and place on a baking sheet. For ease of clean-up line the baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake the cookies for 7 to 9 minutes.  Remove the cookies from the oven and let cool a few minutes before placing them on cooling racks.
